Package photos.controllers

Class ListController<T>

java.lang.Object
photos.controllers.Controller
photos.controllers.ListController<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController, AlbumListController, AlbumOpenController, SearchResultsOpenController
public abstract class ListController<T>
extends Controller
Abstract controller to be extended by concrete controllers that need creation, deletion, and display functionality for a collection of items
Author:
Robert Kulesa, Aaron Kan

    • refreshList

      public void refreshList​(T t)
      Method that reloads the ListView and the controls associated with it as is appropriate given the conditions of the current view
      Parameters:
      t - The item in the collection that the ListView will have selected upon being refreshed

    • isRepeatEntry

      public boolean isRepeatEntry​(T t)
      Method that detects of an attempted new Entry is already an element in the current ListView of type T.
      Parameters:
      t - The item to be analyzed by the algorithm
      Returns:
      boolean determines if the item is a repeat

    • newEntry

      public abstract T newEntry​(java.lang.String fieldKey)
      An abstract method for instantiating a new entry into the ListView of type T. and the collection it represents
      Parameters:
      fieldKey - the String that will identify and instantiate the new entry
      Returns:
      T the newly instantiated entry

    • getCollection

      public abstract java.util.ArrayList<T> getCollection()
      An abstract method for retrieving the collection that represents the controller's ListView of type T.
      Returns:
      ArrayList the collection associated with the controller's ListView type T.

    • removeEntry

      public abstract void removeEntry​(T t)
      An abstract method that removes an entry from the collection that represents the controller's ListView of type T.
      Parameters:
      t - the entry to be deleted

    • isGoodEntry

      public abstract boolean isGoodEntry​(T entry)
      An abstract method that determines if an entry is valid enough to be inserted into the the controller's collection.
      Parameters:
      entry - the entry in question
      Returns:
      boolean the argument's validity for insertion purposes
